body:
The title says it all. I'm a 14 year old arab guy that lost the will to live not so long ago. Other than Minecraft, I play the piano, like to read and listen to music. If you ever see me in game i'll most probably be salty (mainly because nobody plays ctw), but my behaviour around you will improve if we become friends‎.

Ask away.

title: Ask Me Anything - DiabolicForce

replies.body:
How did you find Avicus?
Favorite CTW Map?
Favorite DTM Map?

replies.body:
Some friends were talking about servers similar to ocn and one of them mentioned avicus, so I decided to check it out and yeah it's a nice place‎.
Idk the name but it's the map with cobweb in front of the spawns and woolrooms on the side and a sand/lava floor in the middle because rushing it is easy‎.
I legit hate all dtm maps i've played.

replies.body:
Audi R8 or Nissan GTR
Idk I can play la valse d'amelie some interstellar soundtracks and moments musicaux n.3 by Schubert (these pieces are my favorites, I can play a lot of small songs but I don't keep track xd)
Milky Ways by Bossfight or Written in the stars by Eric turner and tinie tempah (idk the name)
The Goldfinch by Donna Tartt. It's fucking amazing.
